text: Phyllostemonodaphne is a monotypic genus of flowering plants in the family Lauraceae containing the single species Phyllostemonodaphne geminiflora. Quinet, A. (2005). Sinopse taxonômica da família Lauraceae no Estado do Rio de Janeiro, Brasil. Acta bot. bras, 19(3), 563-572. It is endemic to Brazil, where it is known from Espírito Santo, Minas Gerais, and the state of Rio de Janeiro. Most collections have been made near the city of Rio de Janeiro.World Conservation Monitoring Centre. 1998. Phyllostemonodaphne geminiflora. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 1998.
